alert.note: Alert for Espanola Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 2:44PM MST until December 15 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches. The heavier amounts will focus along the foothills of the Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHERE...Espanola Valley. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
